content: {"name": "Serv-a-Tray Program", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Serv-a-Tray is our home-delivered meal program designed to maintain health through proper nutrition and enable homebound seniors to remain in the community with independence and dignity. To be eligible, persons must be age 60 or older; homebound; unable to shop or prepare their own meals; have no one to assist with meals; and be on a regular diet. A complete midday meal is delivered to participants Monday through Friday and frozen meals are available for the weekends.\n\n", "email": "", "url": "https://www.gloucestercountynj.gov/1167/Nutrition-Program", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "115 Budd Boulevard", "address_2": null, "city": "Woodbury", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08096", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.8216632, "longitude": -75.16393099999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 384-6900", "type": "voice"}]}
